title: Snehithane Snehithane Lyrics Alaipayuthey
stanzas:
Snegithane snegithane
ragasiya snegithane
chinna chinnathaai
korikkaigal sevi kodu
snegithane

idhe alutham alutham
idhe anaippu anaippu
vazhvin ellai varai
vendum vendum
vazhvin ellai varai
vendum vendum..

chinna chinna
aththu meeral purivaai.
en cell ellaam pookkal
pookka cheivaai.
malargaiyil malarvaai.

poopparikkum bakthan
pola medhuvaai.
naan thoondum podhu
viral nagam kalaivaai.
saththam indri thuyilvaai

nee azhum podhu
naan azha nerndhaal
thudaikindra viral vendum.

Snegithane snegithane
ragasiya snegithane
chinna chinnathaai
korikkaigal sevi kodu
snegithane

netru mun iravil
un nithiravu maniyil
kaatru nulaivadhu pol
uyir kalandhu kalithirundhen

indru ven nilavil
andha eera ninaivil
kandu thavippadhu pol
manam kalangi
puzhambugiren.

koondhal nedivil
ezhilkuzha sarivil
garvam azhindhathadi
en garvam azhindhathadi

sonnathellaam
pagazhile puriven
sonnathellaam
pagazhile puriven
nee sollaathadhum
iravile puriven
kadhil kondu nulaippen

undhan sattai naanum potu
alaiven ne kuzhikkaiyil
naanum konjam nenaiven.
uppu mottai sumappen.

Snegithane snegithane
ragasiya snegithane
chinna chinnathaai
korikkaigal sevi kodu
snegithane
